amendment.description: To require a report on cell site simulators detected near facilities of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3038 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3038 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4336) To require a report on cell site simulators detected near facilities of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3038 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3038 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2910.
